amendment.description: To set aside funding for the Administration's Clean Energy Technology Exports Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1709 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1709 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11541) To set aside funding for the Administration's Clean Energy Technology Exports Initiative.
